mapper.insert:
insert into t_agent_commission(`date`, uid, username, total_commission, total_performance, self_commission, self_performance, team_performance, direct_performance, sub_performance, rebate, create_time, create_timestamp) values
(#{item.date}, #{item.uid}, #{item.username}, #{item.totalCommission}, #{item.totalPerformance}, #{item.selfCommission}, #{item.selfPerformance}, #{item.teamPerformance}, #{item.directPerformance}, #{item.subPerformance}, #{item.rebate}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.createTimestamp})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_commission = VALUES (total_commission), total_performance = VALUES (total_performance), self_commission = VALUES (self_commission), self_performance = VALUES (self_performance), team_performance = VALUES (team_performance), direct_performance = VALUES (direct_performance), sub_performance = VALUES (sub_performance), rebate = VALUES (rebate)
